definitions.definition: A work made across or in a ditch , to protect it from the enemy (as fire from it could cover the ditch), or to serve as a covered passageway (e.g. to outworks ).

main_definition: ( military , historical ) A work made across or in a ditch , to protect it from the enemy (as fire from it could cover the ditch), or to serve as a covered passageway (e.g. to outworks ).
